text: Þis lan salde Ecgberht cyning Eþericepro ejus pecunia hoc estL mancusashoc estV sulung landes & þis sint þa landgemera æt Worahornan & æt Flodhammam.
And on suðhealfe Seaxana meare & on westhealfe Genlida & on norðhealfe þes hiredes land to Folcanstane.
And þis sindan þa den þe ðerto geberigað.
